item.title: Newark, N.J. mayor arrested at ICE facility, charged with trespassing
item.description: Newark Mayor Ras Baraka was arrested at an ICE facility during a visit with members of New Jersey's congressional delegation.

item.title: Trump administration must halt some DOGE cuts at 20 federal agencies
item.description: A judge is blocking the Trump administration and Elon Musk's DOGE from carrying out sweeping layoffs at over a dozen agencies â€” at least for now.

item.title: 2nd radar outage for Newark Airport in 2 weeks leaves more flyers stranded
item.description: Newark Liberty International Airport suffered another brief air traffic control outage Friday morning, the FAA confirmed.

item.title: Trump fires longtime Librarian of Congress Carla Hayden
item.description: Carla Hayden has been the Librarian of Congress since 2016. She was the first woman and African American to hold the position.

item.title: Hawaii secures $700 million settlement in lawsuit over blood-thinner Plavix
item.description: The settlement divides the $700 million payment equally between pharmaceutical giants Bristol Myers Squibb and Sanofi.
